attributes.action: Promote the creation and use of free municipal wireless networks, and to allow tax breaks for companys/organisations that sponsor these networks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The idea of this is to level out the playing field in regard to Internet access, there is already a huge didital divide in this country with the can-affords and cannots, this will make the internet free and always on, just like it should be, the sum of mankinds knowledge at your fingertips at any time.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/wireless-now/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
